name: UIColor-MoreColors
summary: Named colors for UIColor from wikipedia's list of colors
description:
UIColors+MoreColors
===================
Colors are nice.  It's also nice to have more than just these:
```
+ blackColor
+ darkGrayColor
+ lightGrayColor
+ whiteColor
+ grayColor
+ redColor
+ greenColor
+ blueColor
+ cyanColor
+ yellowColor
+ magentaColor
+ orangeColor
+ purpleColor
+ brownColor
+ clearColor
```

Try 1000+ more. (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧
